message: Starting verification process. First checking status of code_fixer agent to see if code changes are complete.

Continuing to monitor code_fixer progress. Will begin detailed code verification once they complete.

Waiting for code_fixer and task_migrator to complete before finalizing verification report. Integration status: registry_merger DONE (unified registry complete), task_migrator at 50% (3 tasks migrated).
All agents completed. Code_fixer report analyzed. Now creating comprehensive verification report with code verification, regression analysis, integration status, and user recommendations.

VERIFICATION MISSION COMPLETE. Deliverable: verification_report.md with comprehensive analysis. Evidence: (1) Line 1355 fix verified correct - syntax validated, function exists, (2) All 11 WORKSPACE_BASE usages analyzed with regression table, (3) Integration verified - registry merged (9 tasks, 49 agents), 3 of 4 tasks migrated, (4) Test cases simulated and documented, (5) User action items provided (restart MCP, manual cleanup), (6) Brutally honest finding: PARTIAL FIX - lines 60,78,142,2978 still unfixed (Approach C recommended for future). Zero data loss, zero breakage. Coordinated with code_fixer (verified fix), registry_merger (verified merge), task_migrator (verified migration).
